root.title: Inscription on Chinese mirror (е-77)
root.history: Confucius and Jun-Tsi-Tsi are represented on the mirror.
root.names: Splinter of a mirror, The metal mirror, Е 77
root.general: Belongs to times of Tan dynasty (VIII-IX AD).
root.description: There is 1 line of old turkic letters. There are words ‘J.R.RIDBERAS. Galvanstalt Stockholm’ on back of the mirror.
root.investigation: The inscription is studied by W.Radloff 303, H.N.Orkhun 304, L.V.Evtjuhova 305, E.R.Rygdylon 306, E.I.Lubo-Lesnichenko 406, D.D.Vasilev 307.
